title: Google Business Intelligence Professional Certificate
description: Learn in-demand skills like data modeling, data visualization, and dashboarding and reporting in less than 2 months.
learning_outcomes: Design interactive dashboards for real-time monitoring and decision-making.
Generate comprehensive reports to summarize data findings and recommendations.
Develop data storytelling skills to present data-driven narratives.
Utilize business intelligence tools to analyze and interpret business data.
Create compelling data visualizations to communicate insights effectively.
Apply data modeling techniques to structure and organize data for analysis.

title: Análisis de Datos de Google Professional Certificate
description: El comienzo de tu carrera en el análisis de datos. Con este programa adquirirás habilidades que te prepararán para trabajar en menos de 6 meses. No se requiere título ni experiencia previa.
skills: Cálculos En Torno A Los Datos
learning_outcomes: Create compelling data visualizations and dashboards.
Communicate data insights effectively to stakeholders.
Apply data cleaning and transformation techniques using spreadsheets and SQL.
Analyze data using statistical methods and tools.
Evaluate the ethical considerations in data analysis.
Understand the data analysis process from data collection to presentation.

title: Excel Skills for Business Specialization
description: Learn Excel Skills for Business. Master Excel to add a highly valuable asset to your employability portfolio.
learning_outcomes: Analyze data using PivotTables and other Excel tools
Develop financial models and perform sensitivity analysis
Create insightful data visualizations in Excel
Apply Excel functions to solve business problems
Automate tasks using Macros
Manage and organize data effectively within Excel spreadsheets

title: Risk Management Specialization
description: Enhance Your Skills in Risk Management. Understand the theory and practice of risk management and the expected results from a successful risk management process.
skills: Leadership And Financial Risk Estimation And Management
learning_outcomes: Apply risk management principles in various business contexts.
Understand the importance of compliance in risk management
Analyze potential risks and their impact on projects and organizations.
Develop effective risk mitigation strategies.
Evaluate the effectiveness of risk management processes.
Understand the theoretical foundations of risk management.

title: Security in Google Cloud Specialization
description: Launch your career in Cloud Security. This self-paced Specialization gives a broad study of security controls, best practices, and techniques on Google Cloud.
learning_outcomes: Configure and manage security services on GCP
Apply security best practices to protect cloud infrastructure and data
Implement security measures to comply with industry standards and regulations
Design and deploy secure cloud architectures on GCP
Understand security controls available on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Analyze potential security threats and vulnerabilities in GCP environments

title: Songwriting: Writing, Arranging, and Producing Music Specialization

Develop proficiency in music theory concepts relevant to songwriting
Arrange musical elements to create compelling song structures
Produce music using digital audio workstations (DAWs)
Apply songwriting techniques to develop original song ideas
Write lyrics that effectively convey emotions and narratives

title: PostgreSQL for Everybody Specialization

learning_outcomes: Administer PostgreSQL databases, including backup and recovery.
Write efficient SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data.
Analyze database performance and optimize queries for speed.
Develop data models that support specific business requirements.
Design and implement relational databases using PostgreSQL.
Understand and apply advanced SQL concepts like transactions and indexing.

Understand the principles of school health promotion.
Evaluate the effectiveness of school health interventions.
Facilitate communication and collaboration among school staff, families, and community partners to support student health.

title: Artificial Intelligence: an Overview Specialization
learning_outcomes: Implement basic AI models using programming tools.
